author: Kubuntiac
message:
Wild! Good fun. You should encourage them to submit a track to the next Ubuntu media showcase (or whatever it's called) :)

The cameraman needed to have a couple of spots where the constant fast cuts and swinging camera movement were toned down a bit. Just a couple...

Loved the outfits / makeup / music!

author: Kubuntiac
message: You really need to show this to Jono, if you haven't already :)

author: Jos Poortvliet
message: Nice stuff. I'm more of a metal fan than a hiphop fan but the rap ain't that annoying ;-)
